item.title: Horizon heights
item.dc:creator: jkeith3725
item.content:encoded:
Real Estate Media & Video Production Services

Every Horizon Heights package is built for Marietta, OH, realtors, developers, and business owners who need consistent marketing visuals. Choose a ready-made bundle or request a custom quote.

1. Real Estate Photo & Video Packages (Washington County, OH)

Perfect for “real estate photos and videos in Washington County OH.” We deliver crisp interiors, magazine-ready exteriors, twilight options, and cinematic listing walkthroughs with quick-turn editing.

  • HDR and flash photography for MLS, Zillow, and print brochures.
  • 4K walkthroughs and highlight reels; optional agent or voiceover features.
  • Luxury estate, waterfront, and farm packages for high-end real estate photography in Ohio.
  • Online booking, confirmations, and delivery via branded galleries.

2. Drone & Aerial Cinematography

FAA Part 107 pilots capture “commercial drone video Ohio” and dramatic flyovers that highlight acreage, amenities, and neighborhood context.

  • Drone + ground video packages for cohesive storytelling.
  • 360° orbit footage and property line overlays for land and farm listings.
  • Aerial inspections and roof documentation for insurance or development teams.
  • On-site coordination with listing agents, builders, and property managers.

3. Matterport & 3D Virtual Tours

Win remote buyers with immersive “Matterport tours for realtors Ohio.” Every scan includes floor plans, measurement tools, and easy sharing links.

  • Residential and commercial scans with same-week delivery.
  • Add-ons: teaser clips, highlight reels, and branded call-to-action buttons.
  • Ideal for property listing virtual tours, 3D property scans near me, and new construction documentation.
  • Hosting, analytics, and download options for MLS compliance.

4. Business & Corporate Video Production

Launch new offerings, recruit talent, or tell your story with “business promotional video near me” support from our crew. We collaborate with marketing teams to map scripts, storyboards, and distribution.

  • Corporate video production in Marietta, OH for manufacturing, healthcare, and professional services.
  • Brand documentaries, testimonials, and lifestyle branding photography.
  • Business media production packages for small businesses, chambers, and nonprofits.
  • Short-form social ads plus longer form web and broadcast edits.

5. Event & Lifestyle Coverage

Need a highlight reel videographer in Marietta? We cover ribbon cuttings, corporate retreats, community galas, and select celebrations with coordinated aerial and ground crews.

  • Multi-camera coverage for keynote speakers, demonstrations, and performances.
  • Drone footage for outdoor festivals, sports, and parades.
  • Delivery in cinematic recap videos, social snippets, and photo galleries.
  • Add-on: livestream options and on-site same-day edits.

6. Social Media Content & Reels

Stay visible with “social media video production near me” that feeds your pipeline. We produce vertical and square formats ready for Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts.

  • Monthly retainers for realtor marketing content near me, including scripts and posting calendars.
  • Short-form reels for real estate listings and business announcements.
  • Branded motion graphics, captions, and subtitles for accessibility.
  • Performance reports and suggestions for your next campaign.

7. Editing, Retouching & Marketing Support

Outsource your backlog with “real estate video editing Ohio” and professional photo retouching. We also build marketing toolkits that keep your brand cohesive across platforms.

  • Color-accurate photo editing, sky replacements, and virtual staging coordination.
  • Professional video editing for social media, including captions, motion branding, and royalty-free soundtracks.
  • Copywriting for property descriptions, brochures, and landing pages.
  • Canva and Adobe templates for consistent on-brand marketing collateral.

Need a Custom Real Estate Media Solution?

Combine any service to build the perfect bundle for your brokerage, developer, or marketing team. Our team guides strategy, scheduling, production, and delivery so you can focus on clients.

Request Pricing & Availability

Serving Marietta, Parkersburg, Belpre, Vienna, Athens, and the wider Mid-Ohio Valley.

And dont forget to check out the List View: click the icon a few spots to the right of the plus icon and youll get a tidy, easy-to-view list of the blocks and patterns in your post.
item.excerpt:encoded: In the ever-evolving world, the art of forging genuine connections remains timeless. Whether its with colleagues, clients, or partners, establishing a genuine rapport paves the way for collaborative success.

item.title: About us
item.dc:creator: jkeith3725
item.content:encoded:
Horizon Heights

Our mission is to redefine visual storytelling through innovative aerial and ground photography, helping our clients bring their unique stories to life. At Horizon Heights, we aim to inspire connections and elevate perspectives, one project at a time.

Whether you're in need of residential, commercial, or institutional services, we have the expertise and creativity to bring your project to life.

Contact Us

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value:
{"timeout":1761737274,"value":{"content":"

Horizon Heights

Our mission is to redefine visual storytelling through innovative aerial and ground photography, helping our clients bring their unique stories to life. At Horizon Heights, we aim to inspire connections and elevate perspectives, one project at a time.

Whether you're in need of residential, commercial, or institutional services, we have the expertise and creativity to bring your project to life.

Contact Us

[{"id":"about-us-section","elType":"section","settings":{"layout":"full_width"},"elements":[{"id":"about-us-column","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100},"elements":[{"id":"about-us-content","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

About Horizon Heights Productions

We are a Marietta, Ohio media team blending aerial drone cinematography, real estate photography, Matterport 3D tours, and marketing strategy to help clients win more listings and grow their brands.

Founded in the Mid-Ohio Valley, Horizon Heights Productions understands what buyers, investors, and communities expect from modern visuals. From high-end residential estates to Washington County commercial developments, we plan every shoot with intention: tell the right story, highlight the value, and deliver on deadline.

Owner Justin Keith leads a team of FAA-certified pilots, photographers, videographers, and editors dedicated to responsive service. We believe every project deserves the same level of polish—whether you are launching a new subdivision, refreshing your Google Business Profile, or producing a cinematic brand film.

What Sets Us Apart

  • Local focus: Based in Marietta, OH and serving the Mid-Ohio Valley, we arrive on location fast and capture the community cues your buyers recognize.
  • Story-driven media: We script for emotion, shoot for clarity, and edit for impact so your marketing resonates across print, web, and social.
  • Turnkey delivery: Online scheduling, same-week turnarounds, captioned videos, and MLS-ready photos keep your team efficient.
  • Trusted partners: Agents, builders, property managers, and small businesses rely on us for ongoing realtor marketing packages and business media production.

Community Roots & Recognition

Our work spans Marietta, Parkersburg, Belpre, Vienna, and surrounding Southeast Ohio communities. Horizon Heights Productions is proud to support local chambers, tourism boards, and nonprofits with promotional media that fuels economic growth.

Clients regularly refer colleagues after experiencing our responsive communication, on-site professionalism, and polished deliverables. Check the Horizon Heights Productions portfolio or search “Horizon Heights Productions reviews” to see recent feedback.

Let’s Collaborate

Ready to level up your listings or produce a business profile video in Marietta, OH? We’ll strategize the story, schedule production, and manage post-processing so you can focus on clients. Reach out to book a consultation or request our latest media packages.

Start a Project

Horizon Heights Productions · Marietta, OH · Serving Washington County and the Mid-Ohio Valley

"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}]}],"isInner":false}]
About Horizon Heights Productions | Real Estate Media Experts Marietta OH
Meet Horizon Heights Productions, the Marietta OH team delivering drone, photo, Matterport, and marketing content for realtors, businesses, and events across the Mid-Ohio Valley.

item.title: Services
item.dc:creator: jkeith3725
item.content:encoded:
Framing Perspectives, Elevating Spaces

Aerial Photography & Videography

We work collaboratively with our clients to deliver stunning aerial visuals that are both captivating and purposeful. Using state-of-the-art drone technology, we capture perspectives that showcase properties, events, and landscapes in a way that traditional photography simply cannot.

Our team ensures every project is tailored to your needs, taking into account the unique features of your vision while adhering to budgets, timelines, and creative goals. Whether its real estate marketing, special events, or community projects, our aerial imagery elevates your story to new heights.

Transforming Properties into Must-See Listings with Stunning Real Estate Photography

We collaborate with real estate professionals to deliver high-quality photography that highlights every propertys unique appeal. From cozy homes to sprawling estates, our images are designed to capture the attention of buyers and showcase each space in its best light.

Our team focuses on every detaillighting, composition, and anglesto create visuals that make properties stand out in a competitive market. Whether youre marketing a residential property, commercial space, or rental, we work within your timeline and vision to deliver stunning photography that drives results.

Innovative Marketing Solutions to Elevate Your Business

We provide comprehensive marketing services designed to help businesses of all sizes reach their full potential. From developing engaging social media campaigns to creating impactful visual content, we craft strategies tailored to your brands unique needs and goals.

Our expertise spans multiple channels, including digital marketing, social media, email campaigns, and more, ensuring your message reaches the right audience at the right time. Whether youre a small business looking to grow your customer base or an established company aiming to strengthen your market presence, were here to help you thrive.

Creative Design Services to Bring Your Brand to Life

We specialize in creating stunning and impactful graphic designs that tell your brands story. From eye-catching logos and professional face sheets to vibrant postcards, engaging social media reels, and compelling ads, we deliver designs that leave a lasting impression.

Our team works closely with you to understand your vision and translate it into visual content that connects with your audience. Whether its enhancing your online presence, designing marketing materials, or crafting unique branding assets, we ensure every detail reflects the essence of your business.

Your Vision, Our Commitment: Flexible Solutions Tailored to Your Needs

At Horizon Heights, we pride ourselves on our flexibility and dedication to meeting the unique needs of our clients. Whether youre looking for a custom project, a consultation to explore your vision, or immediate support, were here to help.

Our team is always open to new ideas and challenges, ready to collaborate with you and create solutions that align with your goals. From brainstorming innovative approaches to delivering exceptional results, we work with you every step of the way to bring your vision to life. Let us know how we can assistwhether its a call, a consultation, or a completely new idea, were ready to adapt and deliver. Your success is our priority.

Home About Us Services Portfolio Contact

Professional Media, Drone Services & Marketing in Marietta, OH

Photography Videography Aerial Cinematography Virtual Tours Commercials Social Media Management

Book Now View Portfolio

Real Estate Photography

Highresolution photos that help listings sell faster.

Drone Video/Photos

Aerial video and photography for real estate, businesses, and events.

3D Virtual Tours

Interactive tours powered by Matterport for buyers and clients.

Event Coverage

Community events, reunions, and more (excluding weddings).

Commercials & Ads

Video ads and branded content for local businesses.

Social Media Management

Strategy, posting, and analytics for Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube.

Recent Work

What Clients Say

They were prompt and professional. Delivered our photos and video on time. Highly recommend them.

Jo Ann Broker

Exceptional drone videos and photographs. On-site within 24 hours, fast turnaround, easy to work with.

Tyler Land Agent

Aerials are stunning, interiors are crisp, videos polished and professional. Always on time.

Traci Real Estate Agent

Ready to elevate your next project?

Tell us about the property or campaign well confirm availability and send a quote.

Home About Us Services Portfolio Contact

Real Estate Photography, Drone Video & Matterport Tours in Marietta, Ohio

Horizon Heights Productions helps realtors, builders, and small businesses stand out with cinematic real estate photos, aerial drone videos, 3D virtual tours, and high-impact marketing content across Marietta, Washington County, and the Mid-Ohio Valley.

Book Real Estate Shoot
View Portfolio

Full-Service Real Estate Media Near You

From “real estate photos near me” to full marketing campaigns, we deliver fast-turn visuals that help listings sell and local brands grow. FAA-certified, fully insured, and ready to deploy in Marietta, Parkersburg, Belpre, Vienna, and the wider Mid-Ohio Valley.

Real Estate Photo & Video Packages

Magazine-ready interiors, exterior twilight sessions, and 4K walkthrough videos tailored for MLS, Zillow, and social media. Ask about luxury property media, farm and land coverage, and bundled property photography and videography packages.

Drone + Matterport Tours

Aerial drone photography, cinematic fly-throughs, and Matterport 3D virtual tours that keep buyers engaged. Perfect for “3D property scans near me,” commercial sites, and multi-acre listings throughout Ohio.

Business & Event Storytelling

Business promotional videos, corporate profiles, and highlight reels that communicate your brand. We capture live events, trade shows, and community gatherings with synchronized aerial and ground crews.

Social Media & Short-Form Reels

Daily-ready clips, vertical reels, and professional video editing for social media. Keep your listings trending on Instagram, TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and Facebook with branded content built for engagement.

Editing & Marketing Support

Need fast real estate video editing in Ohio or realtor marketing content near you? We handle color correction, licensed music, voiceover, graphics, and ad-ready exports so you can publish instantly.

Flexible Media Solutions

Pick-and-choose services or request a custom bundle — including realtor media packages, business media production, and combined drone + ground crews for hire anywhere in Southeast Ohio.

Industries & Property Types We Serve

  • Residential listings, new construction, condos, downtown lofts, and luxury estates.
  • Rural acreage, farms, and land tracts needing aerial and ground real estate video in Ohio.
  • Commercial offices, retail spaces, medical facilities, and industrial campuses.
  • Hospitality, short-term rentals, and lifestyle brands seeking cinematic marketing videos.
  • Local events, corporate functions, and nonprofit campaigns across the Mid-Ohio Valley.

Why Marietta Agents Choose Horizon Heights Productions

Local expertise: Based in Marietta, OH, we know the angles buyers want to see and deliver next-day availability for urgent listings.

Consistent quality: FAA-certified pilots, pro lighting kits, and calibrated Matterport scans keep every project polished.

Marketing-minded: We script, storyboard, and edit for conversion-ready reels, ads, and “real estate video walkthrough” campaigns.

Transparent pricing: Packages for residential, commercial, farms, and custom media bundles — all delivered with clear turnaround times.

Frequently Asked Questions

Do you offer realtor media packages near me?
Yes. Choose bundled photo, drone, video, Matterport, and social media deliverables tailored to your listing or brokerage.

Can you handle video marketing for realtors?
We plan, film, and edit vertical reels, listing teasers, and long-form marketing videos optimized for Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, and TikTok.

How quickly can I get real estate photos and videos?
Most Marietta shoots include next-day delivery. Rush options and same-week scheduling are available for urgent launches.

Do you travel outside Marietta?
We serve Washington County, the Mid-Ohio Valley, and nearby West Virginia communities. Additional travel is available on request.

Ready to Book?

Tell us about the property or campaign, pick a date, and confirm the deliverables you need. We will send a quote, timeline, and prep checklist so everything runs smoothly.

Request a Quote
Call (304) 543-3081

Serving Marietta, OH • Parkersburg, WV • Belpre, OH • Vienna, WV • the Mid-Ohio Valley

© 2025 Horizon Heights Productions · Marietta, OH · (304) 543-3081 · HorizonHeightsProductions@gmail.com

item.content:encoded:

Services

Service 1

Navigating life's intricate fabric, choices unfold paths to the extraordinary, demanding creativity, curiosity, and courage for a truly fulfilling journey.

Learn more

Service 2

Navigating life's intricate fabric, choices unfold paths to the extraordinary, demanding creativity, curiosity, and courage for a truly fulfilling journey.

Learn more

Service 3

Navigating life's intricate fabric, choices unfold paths to the extraordinary, demanding creativity, curiosity, and courage for a truly fulfilling journey.

Learn more

As we navigate the intricate tapestry of existence, we are constantly presented with choices, each a potential pathway to something extraordinary. This is a world where creativity knows no bounds, where the curious mind finds solace, and where the fearless heart discovers uncharted territories. It is a place where the pursuit of knowledge, the embrace of change, and the willingness to take risks are not mere options but essential ingredients for a life well-lived.

Welcome to a world of limitless possibilities, where the journey is as exhilarating as the destination, and where every moment is an opportunity to make your mark on the canvas of existence. The only limit is the extent of your imagination.
